Incorrect Reasoning.text: The summary concludes that proBNP is "Elevated" without any evidence in the patient record
The summary concludes that hemoglobin is "low" without any evidence from the patient record.
Cardiac enzymes and renal function results are mentioned as "Normal" with no evidence from patient record.
The summary concludes that admission vital signs are "Normal" with no evidence from the medical record.
The Summary concludes that the Discharge vital signs are "Stable" without any evidence from the medical record.

Omitted Other Inconsistency.omittedDetails: The details of the physical exams on admission are omitted
Some of the discharge vital signs are omitted.

Omitted Medicinal Instructions.omittedDetails: The dose of this medication is omitted.
The concentration of this two medications are omitted.
